subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Andrei Greipel of Germany overtook Tom Boonen of Belgium in the final few yards to capture the 108-mile fifth stage at the Spanish Vuelta in 4 hours 27 minutes 54 seconds.
snippet: Andrei Greipel of Germany overtook Tom Boonen of Belgium in the final few yards to capture the 108-mile fifth stage at the Spanish Vuelta in 4 hours 27 minutes 54 seconds.
